messages.subject: free after rebate Britannica & World Book
messages.msgSnippet: I know you can access Britannica online, but at this price you can t deny that having a copy of both Britannica and World Book on cd rom is a great bargain.
messages.messageBody:
I know you can access Britannica online, but at this price you
can't deny that having a copy of both Britannica and World Book on
cd rom is a great bargain. I just ordered my copy and decided to
send the link on. You first have to pay $50 + postage, then send
away for the mail in rebate of $50. I have never had any problems
with getting my rebates from offers like this. Here is the
information I was sent. Sue


******************************************************************************

Encyclopedia Britannica 2000 & World Book Reference Suite-Win -
Free!
(originally $80.90)
For all your research and homework needs, now get both
Encyclopedia Britannica 2000 and World Book Reference Suite
FREE after rebate!
Merchant: SoftwareOutlet.com
http://www.bargaindog.com/prod/?id=6317&uid=530598
